title: This Has To Be The Most Unexpected Spring Trend That Bollywood Has Taken To
text:
facebook 490 SHARES 
The fabulous ways in which Bollywood has been dressing up, lately, has made most of us fashion peeps proud. This risk-taking business is still new-fangled. But that doesn’t take away from the fact that it is, in fact, wildly welcome. In their lofty list of high-fiving season-defining trends, right before they become a national phenomenon, there has been an unexpected entrant. It is being hailed as “workwear stripes”. Not the big, bold ones that the celebs have a platonic relationship with, but the rail-thin ones that could be described as non-effective, at best (at least by the blindingly glamorous Bollywood standard). Only that our leading ladies, this time, don’t seem to mind changing things up, fashion-wise. The trend has been successfully taken to while we still struggle with parting with our so-last-season off-the-shoulders (LET IT GO). Here’s looking at the best stripe moments by glam town’s best-dressed. 1.Anushka Sharma, who has been dishing out perfect tens for Phillauri promotions, was recently seen partnering with the bank stripes in a good-girl skirt that was a winning separate, in its own right. afashionistadiaries/via Instagram 2.Kangana Ranaut whose general badassery dominates our feed, every alternate day, proclaimed her love in a pinstriped H&M suit that befitted her toned waist and wispy wit. stylebyami/via Instagram 3.Alia Bhatt’s Tommy Hilfiger sweat suit can be easily labelled as the lovechild of athleisure and Wall Street – an ideal situation for the millennial-approved actress’ travel style. afashionistadiaries/via Instagram 4.Tisca Chopra ticks two big spring-verified trends with her layered rise-and-fall hemline top – yes, shirts under dresses is still a thing you guys, and serious stripes can be hella sexy, if done right. afashionistadiaries/via Instagram 5. Sure, bank stripes are straight-up formal but a little play on the silhouette, like this cool-girl dress on Kajal Aggarwal, has us convinced otherwise. Get your hands on the Dhruv Kapoor dress here. nkdivya/via Instagram
